eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: In a mountain forest, an old hunter rescues Jessica from the jaws of a beast and takes her to Davistown, the designated site of her mission. At the same time, Jessica's teammates are heading towards the same place, harboring concerns for her safety.

attributes.content: In a panic, Jessica reaches for the handgun at her waist. But fear keeps her fingers saddled atop the holster, unable to bend.
She smells something vaguely rank upon the wind.
Don't do anything rash, now.
From the thicket, a hunter walks into Jessica's line of sight, smoking gun in hand and with a wide-brimmed hat covering his eyes.
She turns and looks behind her to see the body of a wild beast lying in the snow, blood still flowing from the wound in its head.
You ought to keep your wits about you here.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Thank you... for saving me.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Just passing by.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: The elderly man stows his gun and walks straight towards the beast's body.
He draws a knife and slices open its stomach. Clean and precise, to keep the blood from spilling out.
He then sticks both hands into its belly and lets out a long sigh.
It's so damn cold around here.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: ...Excuse me, sir, but are you a local hunter?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Suppose so.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Do you know how to get to Davistown?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...The hell are you going there for?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: I'm meeting up with my teammates.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You ain't alone?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Well, my team split up to rescue a hostage from some bandits, but afterward, I broke my communicator and got lost in the woods.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A hostage? Who?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: An elderly Forte man.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...Didn't expect it'd be you people.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Alright then, follow me.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Wh-Where are we going?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Didn't you say you were heading for Davistown?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Umm, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't say I didn't offer.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: The old man pays her no more heed. He stands up to sling the carcass over his shoulders and briskly walks deeper into the forest.
W-Wait up!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hrmm... You sure about leaving Jessica all alone out there?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I know you're worried, and so am I. But after fighting by her side for so many years, I trust that she's perfectly capable of handling herself.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm just worried there are more bandits out there. A couple of stragglers, sure, but what if they've got a whole band of reinforcements?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Jessica's been through much worse than a bunch of thugs.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Whether it's a rain of arrows whizzing past her scalp, blades nicking her throat...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Or surroundings choked with active Originium, where even a single crack in her protective gear would be immediately evident...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Each and every time, she completes the mission. Without our support, and without the company's supervision.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She may be on her own, but she never fails to deliver results.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...I can't deny that.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: But I'm sure you also know that she comes back every time with red, swollen eyes. So before she returns, someone has to be there for her when she's bawling her eyes out, right?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What do those puffy eyes mean? They mean that she's wiped her tears before coming to see us. She doesn't want anyone to see her crying.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yeah, she's only twenty-three...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yes, twenty-three. And two-and-a-half of those last three years have been spent on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Excuse me, but did an explosion just go off nearby?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: I could swear I heard something... Pretty sure I wasn't imagining it.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It was a tree, not an explosion.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: A tree?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If it gets too cold in the forest, the sap inside expands as it freezes, causing the trunk to burst.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: From a distance, it sounded... a bit like a firefight.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What are you, anyway? Soldier? Merc?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: I've been a mercenary for almost five years now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Family in debt or something?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: No... I just... didn't want to always be sheltered by my family name. I don't want to follow the path that they laid out for me...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: So you went and became a merc?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Y-Yes...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hmph. So, what're you looking for on the battlefield? Fame? Fortune? Or glory?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: None of the above. I want to eliminate crises, resolve conflicts, and protect those in dangerous situations...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Huh... So there are mercs who do that kinda stuff. News to me.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Sir... We're no ordinary mercenary group. We're...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Let me remind you, Jessica. You're a mercenary. This is about business, not duty.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: We...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Alright, enough of that. Don't give me your whole spiel.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you two, but are you talking about that 'seasoned' mercenary with five years of combat experience?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Yeah. Why, got anything to add, Laura?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You two have worked with Jessica a lot longer than me, so you've got a much better grasp of her abilities and limitations than I do, right?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: What, so you think she can handle it on her own?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Of course. Captain Liskarm is right  she's been to far more dangerous places over the last three years.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: While I can't help but worry when I think about that crybaby side of her, we all know she's going to be perfectly fine. Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: She doesn't know that.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yeah, she's the only one...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: But maybe she just needs a chance. Just one chance to see her own worth.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: And you're saying that this is her opportunity?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Uh... I wouldn't go that far...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: S-Sir... Excuse me, sir!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You're awful noisy, young lady.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: I, uhh, didn't mean to bother you... But if you could please take a look over there?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica points to a trap next to a tree in the distance.
There, a beastcub's forelimbs are tightly clamped between metal teeth. The cub whines as blood seeps out from the trap's steel bite.
After the old hunter takes notice, he sets down the beast carcass, walks over to the tree, unties the trap, and frees the cub.
It's just a cub... Maybe we can let it go. If its mother is in the area, we could take a quick look around.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Also, I heard that during the winter, hunters will often let mothers and cubs go so that the pack can reproduce...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Its mother is right here.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: You mean... the beast you just killed?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I've seen this female with her cubs a few times before.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Now, the mother's been shot to death, and the cub stepped in some sloppily-placed trap, so its pelt is all ruined.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: So... what should we do with it?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Wring its neck. Put it out of its misery.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: How could you say that?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What else? It won't last long on a broken leg with no mother.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: You wanna leave it here to die a slow death, you won't hear me complaining.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: ...So, there's no way for it to survive?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Could you please hand it to me then...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You want to finish the job? Be my guest.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Shh... It'll be alright, little fella... Everything will be alright.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica holds the cub in her arms and gently runs her fingers down its fur.
She doesn't do anything else. She patiently waits for the cub's whines to gradually fade away until they disappear completely.
I couldn't save it, but at least... I can let it go in a warm embrace.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Mercs doing hospice care, huh? That's another first for me.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: ...Do you mind if I leave it here? I think... the mother is a good enough catch on its own.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What, you want me to bury it for you, too? Hold a funeral while we're at it?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: No... Every animal in the forest is hungry during the winter. If we leave it here... maybe one of them can have a good meal.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I might be a bit of softy, but... that doesn't mean I'm completely oblivious.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If you get it, then try to keep up, Miss Mercenary. I'm guessing you don't wanna get lost in the woods again.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: The wind's cleared the fog... Sir, did you bring us here just to get a view of Davistown?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...When I was little, I loved running to the high places near the plate, just to get a good look at the town I lived in.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: What was it like back then?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Livelier, more glamorous... More full of life.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: As for now... Well, there's no going back. No turning back the clock.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Brrrr... It's freakin' cold. Can't believe they shipped us off to a place like this.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Franka...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I was just... thinking about Jessica again.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: What about her? Didn't you say you weren't worried?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...I was thinking about that 'opportunity' we were talking about.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Oh, you mean the chance for her to see her own worth?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Who knows? Maybe one day... it'll come to her in a gust of wind. A freaking cold one, so cold it makes her shiver all over.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: But it'll sweep away all the fog before her eyes, and everything will become as clear as day.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I just hope that what she sees then... won't be anything like what we're looking at.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Amidst the dispersing fog, huge tracks formed of fallen trees and broken branches can be seen winding down the hillside towards the center of the valley.
At their end is an abandoned plate.
Despite the distance, everyone can clearly see an energy tower rising from the middle of it, feebly wheezing out puffy white breaths.
Like a dying patient, struggling for air.
